resources.string: This is a home screen where you can access other things.
This is a current song screen where you can see what song is playing.
This is a music library screen where you can search your library to find songs by album name, artist, or song name.
This is a payment screen where you can use Android Pay to buy our subscription.

Through the Android Pay API, users can go through an easy checkout process through a buy button and some requests for shipping/paying information. Additionally, through Stripe documetation on the Android Pay Integration Guide, we can add the Stripe processor.
